relevance_explanation: The routine includes only the steps relevant to the customer, based on their data (Platinum frequent flyer, passport info exists, pays with Points). All irrelevant branches were pruned.
completeness_explanation: All required logic, tools, and branches applicable to this customer's data have been preserved. Visa check logic was removed, as it only applies to non-frequent fliers. The regular flights search option was also removed since that's only used if the customer is not a frequent flyer.
